name: Jump! the Game
description:
"Jump! the Game" is a game all about - you guessed it - JUMPING! 

I created this game based off of the concept of "Can you make a game about just jumping fun?" (Which you can watch on my Youtube channel) With that concept in mind and  working with my self-made restriction of jumping being the only thing the player can do, I expanded the game into something I believe is fun!

Do you think I succeeded? I'd love to hear about what you think!

Controls:

Hold and Release Space to Jump

(That's literally it)
